name: gti525-analytique-script
description: Code source pour le script d'analyse

scripts.browserify: mkdir -p dist/js && npm run hbs && browserify assets/js/indes.js -d -o dist/js/analytique.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:html" "npm test -- --watch" "npm run watchify" "npm run browsersync"
scripts.watch:html: npm run html && onchange 'assets/index.html' -- npm run html
scripts.watchify: mkdir -p dist/js && npm run html && watchify assets/js/index.js -d -o dist/js/analytique.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]

author: Vincent Boiteau-Robert <vboiteau>
